problem.markdown: The purpose of including Guerrilla Drills for strength and mobility is which of the following? ( ) To functionally train the total-body muscular strength and endurance needed to successfully perform WTBDs. (x) To improve combative techniques and the ability to carry/evacuate another Soldier. ( ) To improve upper body and trunk strength and mobility needed for manipulating body weight while under fighting load.
problem.p: The purpose of including Guerrilla Drills for strength and mobility is which of the following?

choicegroup.choice: To functionally train the total-body muscular strength and endurance needed to successfully perform WTBDs.
To improve combative techniques and the ability to carry/evacuate another Soldier.
To improve upper body and trunk strength and mobility needed for manipulating body weight while under fighting load.
